ResourceHeader.Description:
Madrigal is a robust, World Wide Web based system capable of managing and 
	  serving archival and real-time data, in a variety of formats, from a wide range of 
	  upper atmospheric science instruments. Data at each Madrigal site is locally 
	  controlled and can be updated at any time, but shared metadata between Madrigal 
	  sites allow searching of all Madrigal sites at once from any Madrigal site.

InformationURL.Name: Madrigal CEDAR Database
InformationURL.Description: Madrigal is an upper atmospheric science database used by groups throughout the world.

AccessURL.Name: Madrigal CEDAR Database
AccessURL.Description:
Madrigal is an upper atmospheric science database used by groups 
		throughout the world. A number of different datasets are located at this 
		repository.
